RefConfig.Comment: Enable the Internal Voltage Reference buffer
RefConfig.Name: VREFBUFMODEConfigEnable

RefConfig.Comment: Disable the Internal Voltage Reference buffer
RefConfig.Name: VREFBUFMODEConfigDisable

RefConfig.Comment: Configure the internal voltage reference buffer high impedance mode
RefConfig.Name: HighImpedanceModeConfig

RefConfig.Comment: Tune the Internal Voltage Reference buffer
RefConfig.Name: TrimmingValueConfig

RefConfig.Comment: Configure the internal voltage reference buffer voltage scale
RefConfig.Name: InternalVoltageReferenceScaleConfig

LibMethod.Comment: Enable high impedance (VREF+pin is high impedance)
LibMethod.Name: LL_VREFBUF_EnableHIZ

LibMethod.Comment: Disable high impedance (VREF+pin is internally connected to the voltage reference buffer output)
LibMethod.Name: LL_VREFBUF_DisableHIZ

LibMethod.Comment: Set the trimming code for VREFBUF calibration (Tune the internal reference buffer voltage)
LibMethod.Name: LL_VREFBUF_SetTrimming
